articles.description: The EndoFound gala raised $389,925 on Monday night towards research, training, and advocacy for endometriosis
articles.content: Endometriosis Foundation of America co-founder Padma Lakshmi and her daughter Krishna Thea Lakshmi-Dell coordinated in LBDs for the 11th Annual Blossom Ball at Cipriani 42nd Street in Midtown Manhatt… [+8785 chars]
